text:
Just listened to @MattHancock solemnly telling us all to perform our 'civic duty' re Test & Trace. 
And then telling us, again, that Dominic Cummings abided by the guidance when he broke at least three lockdown rules. 
The Health Secretary has lost all credibility. https://t.co/cscNZYrcYL
